interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lesentia Tinted Moisturizer with SPF 31 – Tinted Moisturizer For Face With Spf and Blemish Concealer with All Natural Ingredients like Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E and Zinc* (Medium - 2fl oz)
Review Date: 2020/06/28
Store: L'esentia
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Brand': "L'esentia", 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'jojoba,vitamin e,zinc', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '850016254009'}
Review Text: Barb:  I'm not so sure if I like wearing this L'esentia Tinted Moisturizer.  The SPF 31 is supposed to be great if out in the sun, but this product doesn't really feel like it's absorbed into my face, leaving it shiny.  I don't want it dripping down into my eyes!  If I happen to touch my face it leaves a slick film on the fingers, and I worry about touching anything else and leaving a smudge of the tint.  The moisturizer has an unusual scent when applied, smelling like natural clay.  Maybe that's the Zinc Oxide?  After a while it's not quite as noticeable.  I usually use a same brand moisturizer with SPF 15 and the liquid foundation also SPF 15, and they appear to be much better absorbed into my face.  If this product works for others, that's good.  I'm very fair, and I must say that the tint actually worked  by putting a little natural color in my face.  That was the only part worthwhile for me.
Review Title: Lots of sun protection, but don't like feel on face.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
LumaRx Facial Cleansing Brush with 1-Minute Pulsing Timer and LED Speed Indicator Light, Rechargeable and Showerproof, White/Silver {'Material': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'LumaRx', 'Color': 'White/Silver', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '074590543216', 'Manufacturer': 'LumaRx'} What is possibly better than a good hot bath, and I mean in the Tub! A good soak is totally relaxing. I was in a deep soak cycle when I was able to first use this product. My old one uses replaceable batteries and not water proof. This is water proof, and rechargeable---perfect for the bath. Try not to let it submerge, I think that's common sense. Works just fine in the shower too. Started out with a good exfoliate which removes and loosens dry skin. Next step was to use Dove liquid on the brushes----feels fabulous and clean. That is how I enjoy my personal time.
All of the heads you will ever need are included with this luxury product from the very sensitive brush up to the massaging brush head, there are three. It has three speeds, a very small footprint and lasts a long time on a single charge, a one minute timer allowing the right time per area. It really isn't complicated at all---also comes with a patent carrying case, large enough to hold everything. Excellent product! Exfoliate And Clean Lesentia Tinted Moisturizer with SPF 31 – Tinted Moisturizer For Face With Spf and Blemish Concealer with All Natural Ingredients like Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E and Zinc* (Medium - 2fl oz) L'esentia {'Brand': "L'esentia", 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'jojoba,vitamin e,zinc', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '850016254009'} Barb: I'm not so sure if I like wearing this L'esentia Tinted Moisturizer. The SPF 31 is supposed to be great if out in the sun, but this product doesn't really feel like it's absorbed into my face, leaving it shiny. I don't want it dripping down into my eyes! If I happen to touch my face it leaves a slick film on the fingers, and I worry about touching anything else and leaving a smudge of the tint. The moisturizer has an unusual scent when applied, smelling like natural clay. Maybe that's the Zinc Oxide? After a while it's not quite as noticeable. I usually use a same brand moisturizer with SPF 15 and the liquid foundation also SPF 15, and they appear to be much better absorbed into my face. If this product works for others, that's good. I'm very fair, and I must say that the tint actually worked by putting a little natural color in my face. That was the only part worthwhile for me. Lots of sun protection, but don't like feel on face.
profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Personal Care Enthusiast**: Strong interest in skincare and personal hygiene products, particularly those that enhance relaxation and ease of use.
- **Preference for Convenience**: Values rechargeable, waterproof, and efficient products; prefers features that minimize maintenance, such as avoiding replaceable batteries.
- **Product Quality**: Shows appreciation for luxury items that come with all necessary components. Likely to favor brands that provide comprehensive solutions.
- **Relaxation Focus**: Enjoys long baths and personal care routines that contribute to relaxation; associates product use with a soothing experience.
- **Effectiveness**: Prefers products that offer clear benefits like skin cleaning and exfoliation, and appreciates advanced features, including timers and customizable settings. Recently expressed dissatisfaction with a tinted moisturizer that felt greasy and left an undesirable residue on the skin, indicating a sensitivity to product texture and absorption.
- **Positive User Experience**: Likely to rate products highly if they meet expectations of functionality and pleasure during use, particularly when they enhance the overall bathing experience. However, experiences with products that do not absorb well may lead to more critical evaluations.

Overall, this user demonstrates a consistent preference for high-quality, efficient personal care solutions that complement a calming and enjoyable self-care routine while being mindful of texture and absorption in product selections.
